revtext: These people are good at what they do!   And they put their customers needs ahead of em always,   a vote of ayesha naseem.   Wig-O-Mania   Response   Thanks Ashwin for your appreciation.   Indeed this is the philosophy and part of Wig-O-Mania work ethics whereby we   ensure that our staff offers the best advise to our clients and do not hard sell   anything to them.   We are happy to hear directly from clients that the practise is followed to the   "T" by our team.
